remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将数据传递到 控件的事件处理程序 。The class is used to pass data to the event handler of the control. 属性在执行筛选操作之前提供对筛选器参数值的访问。The property provides access to the filter parameter values before the filtering operation is performed. 可以 通过将 的属性设置 为来取消方法 `true` 。You can cancel the method by setting the property of the to `true`. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用 控件从中间层业务对象中检索数据，然后使用控件显示结果，从而显示筛选后的数据 。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用的中间层业务对象的示例。The second code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that is used by the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件从中间层业务对象中检索数据，然后使用控件显示结果，从而显示筛选后的数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data by using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object, and then using a control to display the results. 仅当检索数据的方法将其检索为或对象时，控件才能筛选 数据 。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 出于此原因， 属性标识将数据作为或对象检索的业务对象方法 。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a or object. 此代码示例包含一个 控件、一个 控件、一个 控件和一个 **提交** 按钮。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，该 控件用 Northwind 商贸中某个雇员的名称填充。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the employees at Northwind Traders. 控件在中显示由名称标识的员工的相关信息 。The control displays information about the employee who is identified by the name in the . 若要检索另一个雇员的数据，请在 控件中键入雇员的全名，然后单击 " **提交** " 按钮。To retrieve data for another employee, in the control, type the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选由属性指定的方法检索的数据 。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the method that is specified by the property. 它使用计算结果为集合中包含的参数的参数占位符 。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符括在单引号中 ( ") 因为参数的类型是可能包含空格的字符串类型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is enclosed by single quotation marks (') because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期，则不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is numeric or date, quotation marks are not required. 集合包含一个参数， 该对象绑定到 控件。The collection contains one parameter, a object that is bound to the control. 如果未在控件中指定任何名称 ，则会将一个新参数添加到集合中， 以便搜索成功。If no name is specified in the control, a new parameter is added to the collection so that the search is successful. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于将数据传递到 对象的事件处理程序 。The class is used to pass data to the event handler of the object. 属性在执行筛选操作之前提供对筛选器参数值的访问。The property provides access to the filter parameter values before the filtering operation is performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应该验证从客户端接收的任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选表达式，并将其应用于 方法返回的对象 。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用 属性作为安全措施来限制返回的项目数，则必须在进行筛选之前验证参数值。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
